definitions.definition: The act of curating , of organizing and maintaining a collection of artworks or artifacts .
The act of curing or healing .
The manual updating of information in a database .
The selective assembly and presentation of information .

main_definition: The act of curating , of organizing and maintaining a collection of artworks or artifacts .
secondary_definitions: ( archaic ) The act of curing or healing .
( databases ) The manual updating of information in a database .
The selective assembly and presentation of information .
